name: TramTrackr
0:
”Alexa, use Tram Tracker”
”Alexa, ask Tram Tracker when the next bus is coming”
”Alexa, Tell Tram Tracker to set my stop ID to ten”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tram tracker
des:
This skill will tell you when the next tram/train/bus is going to arrive at your selected stop.
This skill works in many different locations. Please see the link below to view all locations supported.

Please keep in mind that every public transit system's data is slightly different (despite GTFS being standard). This code has currently been optimized for BC Transit in Whistler, BC, Canada. When using this skill with other public transit systems, some errors may occur.

Go to this site to get your stop ID: https://mkmmvimap26ubyos.anvilapp.net

Source code:
https://github.com/alexdobo/Tram-Trackr
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
